TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseButtonEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 为鼠标按钮相关事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for mouse button related events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与以下事件一起使用： 、 、、、、 和对应的隧道事件。 is used with the following events: , , , , , , and the corresponding tunneling events. 类提供用于确定鼠标状态的附加属性和方法。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个鼠标按钮事件处理程序，该处理程序更改引发事件的对象的颜色。The following example creates a mouse button event handler that changes the color of the object that raised the event. 选择的颜色取决于按下的鼠标按钮。The color chosen depends on the mouse button which was pressed. 检查属性以确定所按下的按钮。The property is checked to determine which button was pressed. summary.span: 获取与该事件关联的按钮的状态。

span.span: Gets the state of the button associated with the event.
The state the button is in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于确定鼠标状态的附加属性和方法。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse. ## Examples 下面的示例创建鼠标按钮事件处理程序，该处理程序更改处理事件的对象的颜色。The following example creates a mouse button event handler that changes the color of the object that handles the event. 选择的颜色取决于按下还是释放鼠标按钮。The color that is chosen depends on whether the mouse button was pressed or released. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsButtonStatePressed](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseeventargsbuttonstatepressed)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsButtonStatePressed](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseeventargsbuttonstatepressed)]

summary.span: 获取与该事件关联的按钮。

span.span: Gets the button associated with the event.
The button which was pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于确定鼠标状态的附加属性和方法。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个鼠标按钮事件处理程序，该处理程序根据所按下的鼠标按钮更改对象的颜色。The following example creates a mouse button event handler that changes the color of an object depending on the mouse button which was pressed. 检查属性以确定所按下的按钮。The property is checked to determine which button was pressed. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseeventargschangedbutton)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseeventargschangedbutton)]

summary.span: 获取单击此按钮的次数。

span.span: Gets the number of times the button was clicked.

value.span: 单击此鼠标按钮的次数。

span.span: The number of times the mouse button was clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的一个用途 是确定是否发生了双击鼠标。One use of is to determine whether a double mouse click has occurred. 某些类公开双击事件，例如 类的事件 。Some classes expose events for a double-click, such as the event on the class. 在类上未公开双击事件时，可以使用 事件数据的属性检测双击。When a double click event is not exposed on a class, a double click can be detected by using the property on the event data. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它确定是发生了单个、双重还是三次单击。The following example creates a which determines if a single, double, or triple click occurred. 属性用于确定点击数。 property is used to determine the number of clicks. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseClickCountDoubleClick](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseclickcountdoubleclick)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseClickCountDoubleClick](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseclickcountdoubleclick)]

protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);
override this.InvokeEventHandler : Delegate * obj -> unit

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用的一般处理程序。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 要对其调用处理程序的目标。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将泛型处理程序强制转换为 ，然后调用它。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 有关此实现模式及其原因的详细信息，请参阅 和 [路由事件概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview).
